title: Ekko? More like Red-ko! [REPOST from Story&Art]
body:
Reposting in correct board, not for likes :P

Cmon, don't tell me I was the only one.

In honor of the new champ and Jen Zee, the amazing artist behind Supergiants' games, but specifically Transistor, here's Ekko in Red's pose.

I take no credit for the pose, definitely Jen Zee's doing, but I did draw this taking inspiration identical to the picture posted below. Tried to mimic her legendary style, but to little avail.

http://i.imgur.com/NoqLBpx.jpg

reference + inspiration:
http://imgur.com/cACUtGW.jpg

replies.body: It was awesome over there, and it's awesome over here :)  I didn't say before, but I really like the glowing underlighting - rather well done.
Haha thanks! Question off topic: what do you do at Riot, Biolu?

Sick. I have only watched a few Let's Plays of Transistor (is it out for Mac yet?) and love it. I didn't see the similarities other than the of the FX used in game. Totally going to enjoy watching this champ.
Hey, it's got a background now! Sweet. You even included Big Fist Guy :P
